items.sentence: Tom walked past Mary without saying anything.
Tom walk his dogs at least three times a day.
Tom waited all morning, but Mary didn't come.
Tom usually wears loose-fitting work clothes.
Tom told me how much he paid for the tickets.
Tom told Mary about his plans for the future.
Tom resigned because of a corruption scandal.
Tom refused tell the police officer his name.
Tom reads everything he can get his hands on.
Tom ran out of gas on his way home from work.
